page.title: 01GAZETTEER G.R. 02400123
page.content: Rural area,lying WSW of market town of Bideford in County of Devonshire,contains three villages of Littleham(SE),Ford and Fairy Cross (W edge). Hamlets at Yeo Yale,Woodtown, Alwington,High Park and Knotty Corner. Population concentrated in three villages and housing estate in Bideford suburbs,otherwise evenly scattered throughout block in hamlets and farms. Total population about 1000 souls. Block traversed EW by main road Bideford _ Clovelly _ North Cornwall in N and road Landcross _ Yeo Valley in S squares.Minor,narrow,bank and hedge lined roads,5 in number traverse approx. N_S linking major roads. Occupations almost entirely farming and related industries,otherwise majority of population in villages commute to work in neighbouring urban centres,Bideford,Torrington.
